column1: On [[9 December]] [[1965]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"
column2: a letter]] to William McCullam''' of Ohio, USA.<ref name=CG>{{CG

column1: *'''Subject:''' Tolkien is grateful for McCullam having sent him a "royalty" for the [[Ace Books]] edition of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.<ref name=CG/>
*'''Publication:''' A description of the letter appeared in ''[[The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide
column2: The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide: Chronology]]''.
